communication.message: As the Retailer, I have an inventory of 88 units and no backlog. My recent profit has been $58.24, and my total profit so far is $658.24. I believe we can work together to maximize the overall supply chain profitability while avoiding stockouts and excessive inventory costs.  Based on my current state, I plan to order 12 units this round to meet the recent demand. I encourage the Wholesaler, Distributor, and Factory to share their inventory and order plans so we can coordinate and prevent the bullwhip effect. Let's all aim for a 1-round supply cover to balance inventory costs and customer service. By sharing information and aligning our strategies, we can keep the entire supply chain profitable and stable.
communication.strategy_hint: Maintain 1-round supply cover, share information to coordinate
communication.collaboration_proposal: Align on 1-round supply cover target, share inventory/order plans
communication.information_shared: Current inventory (88), recent demand (12), profit so far ($658.24)

communication.message: I hear the Retailer has an inventory of 88 units and no backlog, with a recent profit of $58.24 and a total profit of $658.24. Based on this, my conclusion is that we should work together to maintain a 1-round supply cover across the entire chain to balance inventory costs and customer service. As the Wholesaler, I currently have 88 units in inventory and no backlog. To support the Retailer's order and prevent stockouts, I will order 12 units from the Distributor this round. By sharing our inventory and order plans, we can coordinate to prevent the bullwhip effect and keep the entire supply chain profitable and stable. Let's all aim for a 1-round supply cover target to optimize our collective performance.

communication.message:
Hello fellow supply chain partners. As the Retailer, I currently have 79 units in inventory and 0 units in backlog. My recent demand has been 12 and 9 units. I made a profit of $43.42 last round, bringing my total profits so far to $671.66. 

I propose that we work together to maintain a steady 1-round inventory cover across the entire supply chain. This will help us avoid costly stockouts and excess inventory. I plan to order 12 units this round to meet the recent demand and maintain my inventory levels. 

I encourage the Wholesaler, Distributor, and Factory to also aim for 1-round cover in their respective stages. By aligning our inventory targets, we can minimize the bullwhip effect and keep the entire supply chain profitable. I'm happy to share my inventory and demand data to help with this coordination. Let's work together to maximize our collective profits!
communication.strategy_hint: Maintain 1-round inventory cover, share data to coordinate
communication.collaboration_proposal: Align on 1-round inventory cover target across all stages
